name: Excalibur
description: A legendary sword said to be forged by the god himself

name: Branch of Yggdrasil
description: Branch of the world tree, holds tremendous magical power

name: Rotten Wooden Staff
description: Staff of an apprentice mage from century ago

name: Slightly Dull Steel Sword
description: A failure piece of equipment from the renowned blacksmith

name: Shiny Stone Rod
description: A stone rod. But it is so shiny!

name: Polished Steel Sword
description: A masterpiece from the renowned blacksmith, it's still in good condition

name: Ruby Staff
description: A wizard staff with ruby conduit at the tip

name: Fiery Blade
description: A magical sword that is lit with eternal flame, good for warming yourself up in the winter

name: Mythril Sword
description: A sword made from mithril, has good magical capability

name: Book of Power
description: A tome popular among wealthy wizard

name: Tellulam
description: A unique sword forged in the depth of hell, said to corrupt the user's mind

name: Grimoir of Truth
description: A grimoir recorded all that is true, all that is good and all that is evil
